title: Vicor: Powering The Next Generation Of AI Clusters
text: Vicor Corporation is rated a buy for growth investors, driven by its unique positioning in next-gen data center power delivery. VICR's Gen 5 chipsets and vertical power delivery systems offer a strong technological moat, targeting surging AI-driven power demands. Despite recent revenue volatility from a patent settlement, VICR demonstrates robust margin expansion, resilient cash flows, and a debt-free balance sheet.
